contentrichtext.text: '''''The Pianist''''' (''El Pianista'') was a 1998 [[Catalan language|Catalan-language]] film directed by [[Mario Gas]], and based on a novel by [[Manuel Vázquez Montalbán]]. It tells the story of two musicians, played in their old age by [[Serge Reggiani]] and [[Laurent Terzieff]] and in their youth by [[Pere Ponce]] and [[Jordi Mollà]], who were friends at the onset of the [[Spanish Civil War]]. They meet 60 years later, and we are presented with the strikingly different paths which they took in the circumstances of the war. ==External links== * {{IMDb title|0158088|The Pianist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Pianist}} [[Category:1998 films]] [[Category:Catalan-language films]] [[Category:Films based on novels]] [[Category:Spanish-language films]] [[Category:Films about classical music and musicians]] [[Category:1990s drama films]] {{1990s-drama-film-stub}}
